infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_periscopeson: Fire-control system linked to the submarine's sonar array. Designed for engaging targets at long-range via sonar instrumentation.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_magazinestor: An armored compartment for storing shells and ammunition boxes.
A larger armored compartment for storing shells and ammunition boxes.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_loadingeleva: A transport system for moving shells and ammunition in bulk between different areas of the submarine. Links to any other conveyors.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_mediumsslroc: A simple hand truck for moving 80mm and 100mm-SSL shells with ease.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_warheadsmall: Integral general-purpose explosive payload. Useful as a drone weapon payload or submarine scuttling charge. Can be rearmed at an outpost or using a block of UEX.
Integral general-purpose explosive payload. Useful as a drone weapon payload or submarine scuttling charge. Can be rearmed at an outpost or using a block of UEX.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_warheadmediu: Integral general-purpose explosive payload. Useful as a drone weapon payload or submarine scuttling charge. Can be rearmed at an outpost or using a block of C-4.
Integral general-purpose explosive payload. Useful as a drone weapon payload or submarine scuttling charge. Can be rearmed at an outpost or using a block of C-4.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_warheadnucle: Integral nuclear explosive. Useful as a drone weapon payload or submarine scuttling charge. Can be rearmed at an outpost or using a nuclear depth-charge shell.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_heavyrailgun: Basic shell for a heavy railgun.
A heavy railgun shell that when fired bursts into multiple large piercing projectiles.
A fragmentation projectile for heavy railgun. It will detonate when close to the opponent, shooting out a lot of shrapnel.
Nuclear shell for a heavy railgun.
infotexts.entitydescription.EKR_Gunnery_Heavyrailg: A harpoon that can be fired from a heavy railgun, instantly releasing multiple large harpoons upon firing to drag targets such as submarines or large monsters closer.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_chaingunammo: Conventional ammunition for a chaingun turret.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_chaingunpier: Conventional ammunition for a chaingun turret.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_chaingunphys: Physicorium alloy ammunition for a chaingun turret.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_chaingunpier: Advanced fragmentation ammunition for a chaingun turret.
infotexts.entityname.ekgunnery_chaingunpiercingexp: Light Chaingun Turret Armor-Piercing Explosive Round
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_autocannonam: Conventional ammunition for an autocannon turret.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_autocannonex: High-explosive ammunition for an autocannon turret.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_autocannonpi: Armor piercing ammunition for an autocannon turret.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_autocannonfl: Flechette canister ammunition for an autocannon turret.
Flak ammunition for an autocannon turret.
Proximity-fuse flak ammunition for an autocannon turret.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_autocannonph: Physicorium alloy ammunition for an autocannon turret.
infotexts.entityname.ekgunnery_autocannonarmorpier: Armor Piercing Explosive Autocannon Ammunition Box
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_autocannonar: Shaped-charge penetrator ammunition for an autocannon turret.
infotexts.entityname.ekgunnery_autocannonarmorpier: Armor Piercing Explosive Autocannon Turret Round
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_autocannonfl: A flare projection solution in autocannon form. When fired, it creates a bright flare for spotting enemies.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_mircosslammo: Self-propelled 20mm cartridges for a micro-SSL turret.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_mircosslpier: Self-propelled 20mm cartridges for a micro-SSL turret.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_mircosslphys: Self-propelled 20mm cartridges for a micro-SSL turret.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_mircosslpier: Self-propelled 20mm cartridges for a micro-SSL turret.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_smallsslammo: Self-propelled 37mm cartridges for a small-SSL turret.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_smallsslpier: Self-propelled 37mm cartridges for a small-SSL turret.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_smallsslexpl: Self-propelled 37mm cartridges for a small-SSL turret.
infotexts.entityname.ekgunnery_smallsslarmorpierci: Armor Piercing Explosive Small SSL Ammunition Box
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_smallsslarmo: Self-propelled 37mm cartridges for a small-SSL turret.
infotexts.entityname.ekgunnery_smallsslarmorpierci: Small SSL Turret Armor Piercing Explosive Round
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_smallsslphys: Self-propelled 37mm cartridges for a small-SSL turret.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_mediumsslroc: Self-propelled 100x800mm SSL shell equipped with an explosive warhead.
Self-propelled 100x800mm SSL shell equipped with an armor-piercing warhead.
Rocket-propelled 100x800mm SSL shell equipped with a flak warhead.
Rocket-propelled 100x800mm SSL shell equipped with a flak warhead.
Rocket-propelled 100x800mm SSL shell equipped with a proximity-fused flak warhead.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_80mmshell: Conventional 80mm supercavitating shell with steel core.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_80mmshell_ex: Conventional 80mm supercavitating shell with explosive warhead.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_80mmshell_pi: Conventional 80mm supercavitating shell with armor piercing core.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_80mmshell_ar: Conventional 80mm supercavitating shell with shaped-charge warhead.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_80mmshell_fl: Conventional 80mm supercavitating shell with time-fused flak warhead.
Conventional 80mm supercavitating shell with proximity-fused flak warhead.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_mininglasera: Heavy non-rechargable capacitor which supplies the isolated power modulation needed to drive an acoustic laser system. The casing includes large heatsinks to accommodate the unit's tendancy to heat up during extended use.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newsurplusco: Feeds coilgun ammunition to a linked coilgun turret.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newchaingunl: Feeds chaingun ammunition into a linked chaingun turret.
Feeds chaingun ammunition into a linked chaingun turret.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newmicrossll: Feeds ammunition into a linked SSL turret.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newsmallssll: Feeds ammunition into a linked SSL turret.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newautocanno: Feeds autocannon ammunition into a linked autocannon turret.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newmediumssl: Feeds ammunition into a linked SSL turret
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_new80mmcanno: Feeds cannon ammunition into a linked cannon turret.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newvortexcan: Supplies pressurized air to a linked vortex-ring cannon
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newauxiliary: Feeds ammunition into a linked SSL turret
Feeds chaingun ammunition into a linked chaingun turret
Supplies power connection to a linked mining laser turret.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newheavyrail: Feeds heavy railgun ammunition into a linked railgun turret.
Feeds heavy railgun ammunition into a linked railgun turret.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newheavyauto: Feeds autocannon ammunition into a linked heavy autocannon turret.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newspinalrai: Feeds railgun ammunition into a linked spinal railgun.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newspinalhea: Feeds heavy railgun ammunition into a linked spinal heavy railgun.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newspinalmed: Feeds railgun ammunition into a linked spinal medium SSL.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newheavyhard: An empty weapon station heavy turrets can be installed on.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newheavyrail: Large diameter railgun with formidable stopping power. Requires an even greater energy supply to fire than a standard railgun.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newheavyauto: Heavy multi-barrel autocannon. Tears apart moderately armored vessels and creatures with overwhelming fire.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_acousticpuls: Heavy sonar-like emitter which produces a powerful sonic shockwave when activated. Only damages creatures.
Heavy sonar-like emitter which produces a powerful sonic shockwave when activated. Only damages creatures.
Heavy sonar-like emitter which produces a powerful sonic shockwave when activated. Only damages creatures.
Heavy sonar-like emitter which produces a powerful sonic shockwave when activated. Only damages creatures.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_meleespikess: A rugged metal spike attached to the submarine. Crude but effective defensive measure.
A rugged metal spike attached to the submarine. Crude but effective defensive measure.
A rugged metal spike attached to the submarine. Crude but effective defensive measure.
A rugged metal spike attached to the submarine. Crude but effective defensive measure.
A rugged metal spike attached to the submarine. Crude but effective defensive measure.
A rugged metal spike attached to the submarine. Crude but effective defensive measure.
A rugged metal spike attached to the submarine. Crude but effective defensive measure.
A rugged metal spike attached to the submarine. Crude but effective defensive measure.
A rugged metal spike attached to the submarine. Crude but effective defensive measure.
A rugged metal spike attached to the submarine. Crude but effective defensive measure.

A rugged metal spike attached to the submarine. Crude but effective defensive measure.
A rugged metal spike attached to the submarine. Crude but effective defensive measure.
A rugged metal spike attached to the submarine. Crude but effective defensive measure.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_meleespikest: A defensive spike that can be extended or retracted on demand.
A defensive spike that can be extended or retracted on demand.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_meleeramming: Damages creatures and structures in front of it when activated. (Currently, there seems to be a potential unknown bug. It is not recommended for use.)
Damages only creatures in front of it when activated. (Currently, there seems to be a potential unknown bug. It is not recommended for use.)
Damages creatures and structures in front of it when activated. (Currently, there seems to be a potential unknown bug. It is not recommended for use.)
Damages only creatures in front of it when activated. (Currently, there seems to be a potential unknown bug. It is not recommended for use.)
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newsurplusco: A turret that propels metal bolts using electromagnets. An obsolete design in comparison to current coilgun technology, but this surplus model can be found at a fairly cheap market price.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newchaingunt: Conventional weapons system with a high rate of fire utilizing self-propelled cartridges. Effective against small, fast targets.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newminiguntu: Conventional weapons system with a very high rate of fire utilizing self-propelled cartridges. Has a short windup period.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newmicrossl: Experimental weapons-system with extremely high rate of fire. Very effective against soft targets in short bursts. Fires 20mm supercavitating rounds.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newsmallssl: Experimental weapons-system with high rate of fire. However its sustained-fire capability is somewhat limited by ammo capacity. Fires 37mm self-propelled rounds.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newautocanno: Conventional cannon which fires relatively light shells, but does so at a substantially increased fire-rate.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newmediumssl: Experimental weapons-system which excels at quickly laying down fire at moderate range. Fires 100mm self-propelled shells.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_80mmcannontu: Conventional 80mm cannon firing supercavitating ammunition. Distant predecessor to the standard coaliton railgun as a heavy damage dealer.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_vortexcannon: Directional sonic weapon which utilizes a pneumatically driven hammer to produce a ring-shaped underwater shockwave. Only damages creatures.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_modularmissi: Component of modular shuttle-based munitions. Applies force on the horizontal plane.
Component of modular shuttle-based munitions. Buoyancy control.
Component of modular shuttle-based munitions. Remote camera and sonar data feed.
Component of modular shuttle-based munitions. Remote camera and sonar data feed.
Component of modular shuttle-based munitions. Internal positioning and guidance system.
Component of modular shuttle-based munitions. Coupling Device.
Component of modular shuttle-based munitions. Coupling Device.
Component of modular shuttle-based munitions. Coupling Device.
Component of modular shuttle-based munitions. Coupling Device.
Component of modular shuttle-based munitions. Applies force on the vertical plane.
Component of modular shuttle-based munitions. Applies force on the vertical plane.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newspinalhar: An empty hull hardpoint special spinal weapons can be installed on.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newspinalrai: A standard railgun mounted directly to the hull of the vessel for greatly decreased mechanical complexity but limited angle of fire. Requires very large surges of power (usually supplied by supercapacitors) and has a low rate of fire, and as such it's most often used against large and heavily armored targets.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newspinalpul: A large pulsed chemical laser mounted directly to the hull of the vessel for greatly decreased mechanical complexity but limited angle of fire. Inflicts extreme burns on anything it hits.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newspinalhea: A heavy railgun mounted directly to the hull of the vessel for greatly decreased mechanical complexity but limited angle of fire. Requires an even greater energy supply to fire than a standard railgun.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newspinalmed: A medium SSL battery mounted directly to the hull of the vessel for greatly decreased mechanical complexity but limited angle of fire. Experimental weapons-system which excels at quickly laying down fire at moderate range.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_newauxiliary: An empty turret mount for specialized equipment and small weapons.
Light chaingun on an auxiliary turret for point defense or coaxial firing. Fire rate is slightly reduced due to autoloader size constraints.
4x medium SSL battery on an auxiliary turret. Fires 100mm self-propelled shells.
Acoustic-resonance laser system designed to break apart ice and soft minerals while leaving valuable ore intact.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_railgun_styl: A heavy turret that uses electromagnetic force to launch shells at very high velocities. Requires very large surges of power (usually supplied by supercapacitors) and has a low rate of fire, and as such it's most often used against large and heavily armored targets.

A heavy turret that uses electromagnetic force to launch shells at very high velocities. Requires very large surges of power (usually supplied by supercapacitors) and has a low rate of fire, and as such it's most often used against large and heavily armored targets.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_spinalrailgu: A standard railgun mounted directly to the hull of the vessel for decreased mechanical complexity but limited angle of fire. Requires very large surges of power (usually supplied by supercapacitors) and has a low rate of fire, and as such it's most often used against large and heavily armored targets.

infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_heavyrailgun: Large diameter railgun with formidable stopping power. Requires an even greater energy supply to fire.
Large diameter railgun with formidable stopping power. Requires an even greater energy supply to fire.
Large diameter railgun with formidable stopping power. Requires an even greater energy supply to fire.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_spinalheavyr: A heavy railgun mounted directly to the hull of the vessel for decreased mechanical complexity but limited angle of fire. Requires very large surges of power (usually supplied by supercapacitors) and has a low rate of fire, and as such it's most often used against large and heavily armored targets.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_coilgun_lega: A rapid-firing turret that propels metal bolts using electromagnets. Generally not very effective against large or heavily armored targets, but ideal for taking down smaller enemies.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_coilgun_styl: A rapid-firing turret that propels metal bolts using electromagnets. Generally not very effective against large or heavily armored targets, but ideal for taking down smaller enemies.
infotexts.entitydescription.ekgunnery_chaingun_tur: Conventional weapons system with a high rate of fire utilizing self-propelled cartridges. Effective against small, fast targets.
Conventional weapons system with a high rate of fire utilizing self-propelled cartridges. Effective against small, fast targets.

Conventional cannon which fires relatively light supercavitating shells, but does so at a substantially increased fire-rate.
